step_feedback.feedback: Great job sitting or standing comfortably! Your body positioning looks good.
You're placing your hands on your abdomen well. Keep up the good work!
Your muscle tightening during the inhale is good. Try to visualize the fluid moving to your chest a bit more strongly.
You're relaxing your muscles nicely on the exhale. Focus on visualizing pushing the fluid out with each breath.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with this deep breathing exercise! Remember to tighten your whole body when you inhale and relax when you exhale. Keep visualizing the fluid moving to help with drainage.
